description: horn with silver elements at top and bottom ends; each silver element attached to the end of a silver chain; one side of silver element at widest end of horn is embellished with engraved text (in Vai script); cap on wide end has raised decoration of four teardrop shapes; scalloped designs at edges of silver caps
dimension:
4 x 7 3/8 x 1 5/8 in. (10.16 x 18.73 x 4.13 cm) (without chain)
31 1/4 in. (79.38 cm) (object part, chain length)
title: Horn pendant with chain
